Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory99.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Yooooooo look! We're nearing the sea! The sea is BLUE! It's totes different than in the Nighter!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Chrome', 3: 'Kamui, can you just stay still in your seat...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chrome', 3: "You shouldn't drop your guard even on a vacation, otherwise you might not be ready for possible emergencies.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Oh there won't be no stinkin' emergencies! Yeah, else the Prez wouldn't send us on vacation!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Commandant! Get a word through my good Capt., yeah? It's time to reeelaaax!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You should sit down, though.', 3: '15', 4: "Relaxing's nice.", 5: '18'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'How could you, Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: "Besides, you're already here with us! Relax, relax!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Your gaze follows the direction Liv points. Everyone gathers around—'}
{3: "—It's the sea."}
{3: "—The coastline quickly zips past and beneath you, the land fading out of view. The cerulean beyond engulfs the plane's windows."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory207.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'There have been missions near the sea before, but simply coming to see the sea and sea only... is indeed a first.'}
{3: 'No wonder everyone is stunned. No one ever had the chance or leisure for sea-viewing in the past.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "So pretty... It's my first time seeing the sea like this..."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Indeed... It's completely different from the grayish waters back on the Nighter..."}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Over 70% of Earth's surface is covered by water, so naturally, there'd be many kinds of seas."}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Is that so...?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'So! What do we do on a vacation anyways?'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "I don't think I've had a vacation since I became part of Babylonia."}
{2: 'Going on a vacation...', 3: '49'}
{2: "...means it's time to play!", 3: '51', 4: '...means just lazing around doing nothing!', 5: '57'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Play... What do you mean by that, Commandant?'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Same. I require a more definite answer.'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: "Doing nothing... We're flying all this way over to the Caribbean to do nothing?"}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'I find it quite difficult to comprehend.'}
{3: '...It does seem like a brain teaser to explain the concept of fun and leisure to Constructs. After all, their purpose is to make war, not play.'}
{3: "But before you reach a conclusion, a sudden bright flash illuminates the porthole, drawing everyone's attention."}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'Whoa! Wazzat?'}
{3: 'A white halo above the sea surface flirts into your eyes, followed by several building outlines.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's... That kind of looks like the game we played before...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I checked the coordinates... That's Venus Splash Park!", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Venus Splash Park...? Feels familiar somehow...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: 'Attention all passengers, we are now nearing the landing site next to Venus Splash Park. Please prepare for landing—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory184.png'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "That's Venus Splash Park. Quite a sight, eh?"}
{2: "What's Venus Splash Park?", 3: '81', 4: 'That halo?', 5: '82'}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "Supposed to be a water park built by some zaibatsu, but after the virus broke out, everything's been free real estate."}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "That's the skylight corridor of the park. Some zaibatsu built this whole place, but after the virus broke out, everything's been free real estate."}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "This place is the dream for a vacation. We'll be landing nearby."}
{2: 'Pilot', 3: "You can't find an airport or a runway in this stretch, so I'll hover near the pier there. You guys can hop off there."}
